医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
梅奥诊所为癌症患者进行全喉移植创造了病史梅奥诊所宣布在器官移植方面取得突破性成就，为成千上万因喉功能减弱或丧失而失去自主说话、吞咽和呼吸能力的人带来希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Mayo-Clinic-makes-medical-history-with-total-larynx-transplant-for-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Mayo-Clinic-makes-medical-history-with-total-larynx-transplant-for-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=510a7ad4-b9e7-4aaf-9835-2499bb318df9 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 22:32:09 -0400 Mayo Clinic makes medical history with total larynx transplant for cancer patient
调查显示许多女性不知道微创子宫肌瘤治疗在个人被诊断患有子宫肌瘤的女性中，超过一半 (53%) 接受了子宫切除术，而只有不到五分之一 (20%) 的女性接受了其他侵入性较小的选择，例如非处方非甾体抗炎药 (NSAID)。根据代表介入放射学会的哈里斯民意调查的最新调查数据，子宫肌瘤栓塞术（19%）、子宫肌瘤栓塞术（17%）、口服避孕药（17%）和子宫内膜去除术（17%）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Survey-reveals-many-women-unaware-of-minimally-侵袭-uterine-纤维瘤-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Survey-reveals-many-women-unaware-of-minimally-guarantee-uterine-纤维瘤-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=783c0c5f-85cb-49a1-9e6c-e9271a0af09c Tue, 09 Jul 2024 21:47:29 -0400 Survey reveals many women unaware of minimally invasive uterine fibroid treatments
干细胞样细胞被发现可促进侵袭性儿童脑肿瘤的生长贝勒医学院、德克萨斯儿童医院、多伦多病童医院和合作机构的一组研究人员发现并定位了一群干细胞样细胞，这些细胞在发育中的细胞中引发和维持第 3 类髓母细胞瘤 (Gr3-MB)。脑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Stem-like-cells-found-to-drive-growth-of-aggressive-pediatric-brain-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Stem-like-cells-found-to-drive-growth-of-aggressive-pediatric-brain-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=919fa428-e5cb-4998-b644-e005189927c6 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 21:39:48 -0400 Stem-like cells found to drive growth of aggressive pediatric brain tumors
阻断 nidogen-2 增强胰腺癌化疗疗效加文医学研究所的研究人员已经确定了胰腺癌的潜在新治疗靶点，胰腺癌是治疗选择有限的最致命的癌症类型之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Blocking-nidogen-2-enhances-chemotherapy-efficacy-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Blocking-nidogen-2-enhances-chemotherapy-efficacy-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3d515dc-24b2-44a9-9a0c-d237e71a7590 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 14:50:24 -0400 Blocking nidogen-2 enhances chemotherapy efficacy in pancreatic cancer
开发新平台来探测参与代谢的基因的功能一个多学科研究团队开发了一个发现平台来探测参与新陈代谢的基因的功能；所有维持生命的化学反应的总和。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/New-platform-development-to-probe-the-function-of-genes-involved-in-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/New-platform-development-to-probe-the-function-of-genes-involved-in-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a194c3d3-3fbb-40b9-a9cb-38fa942c0ae3 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 14:38:08 -0400 New platform developed to probe the function of genes involved in metabolism
研究发现患有严重心理健康症状的儿童的寄宿率存在差异麦克莱恩医院和哈佛医学院的研究人员与马萨诸塞州总医院和剑桥健康联盟的研究人员合作进行的一项新研究发现，急诊科患有严重心理健康症状的儿童和青少年的寄宿率存在差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Study-uncovers-disparities-in-boarding-rates-of-children-with-severe-mental-health-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Study-uncovers-disparities-in-boarding-rates-of-children-with-severe-mental-health-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6101930c-e2fb-46f5-9ddc-5163c56065ea Tue, 09 Jul 2024 14:33:55 -0400 Study uncovers disparities in boarding rates of children with severe mental health symptoms
牛奶可能传播 H5N1 流感，但空气传播有限虽然从受感染的牛奶中提取的 H5N1 禽流感病毒滴入小鼠和雪貂的鼻子后会导致它们生病，但病毒在雪貂之间通过空气传播；人类传播的通用模型 -；似乎是有限的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Cows-milk-may-spread-H5N1-flu-but-airborne-transmission-is-limited.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Cows-milk-may-spread-H5N1-flu-but-airborne-transmission-is-limited.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02a5c42d-5491-40bd-8e6d-6dad91f84cc8 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 14:29:10 -0400 Cow's milk may spread H5N1 flu, but airborne transmission is limited
都柏林三一学院的研究人员发现了增强 MRSA 疫苗功效的关键都柏林三一学院的研究人员在了解我们如何对抗潜在致命的耐甲氧西林金黄色葡萄球菌（MRSA）方面迈出了一大步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Trinity-College-Dublin-researchers-uncover-key-to-enhancing-MRSA-vaccine-efficacy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Trinity-College-Dublin-researchers-uncover-key-to-enhancing-MRSA-vaccine-efficacy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4dfbe3c5-4c44-4438-85fc-8516abbfa7ef Tue, 09 Jul 2024 14:23:28 -0400 Trinity College Dublin researchers uncover key to enhancing MRSA vaccine efficacy
了解镰状细胞病患者的痛苦虽然镰状细胞病患者的痛苦已有充分记录，但痛苦的来源以及患者如何处理痛苦尚未得到充分探讨。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Understanding-病人-distress-in-sickle-cell-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Understanding-病人-distress-in-sickle-cell-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=142253ea-a997-4e09-bbbd-048a51ab107a Tue, 09 Jul 2024 08:29:34 -0400 Understanding patient distress in sickle cell disease
动物模型揭示了正在研究的脑器官在修复中风损伤中的作用辛辛那提大学的研究人员开创了一种动物模型，揭示了大脑中未被研究的器官在修复中风造成的损伤中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Animal-model-sheds-light-on-the-role-understudied-brain-organ-in-repairing-中风-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Animal-model-sheds-light-on-the-role-understudied-brain-organ-in-repairing-中风-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7a012be-fa6e-46c7-8891-af16381bd92a Tue, 09 Jul 2024 08:23:57 -0400 Animal model sheds light on the role understudied brain organ in repairing stroke damage
